    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ArgumentRequester
    The ArgumentRequester class provides utility methods to request input of different data types (e.g., Double, Float, String, Long) from the user via the console.
    ClientAdd
     
    ClientAddIfMax
     
    ClientAddIfMin
     
    ClientClear
     
    ClientCommand
     
    ClientCountByDistance
     
    ClientCountGreaterThanDistance
     
    ClientExecuteScript
     
    ClientExit
     
    ClientHelp
     
    ClientInfo
     
    ClientPrintFieldDescendingDistance
     
    ClientRemoveById
     
    ClientRemoveGreater
     
    ClientSave
     
    ClientShow
     
    ClientUpdate
     
    CommandArgument
    Abstraction over arguments passed to a command
    CommandArgumentList
    Represents a list of command arguments used in command execution.
    CommandIdentifier
     
    CommandManager
     
    Coordinates
    The Coordinates class represents a set of coordinates with x and y values.
    CustomCollection
    Represents a custom collection of Route objects.
    InputManager
    The InputManager class provides methods to manage and handle user input.
    JavaFileStrings
    Constants for reading files
    JsonReader
    A class responsible for reading JSON files and converting them into a CustomCollection of Route objects.
    JsonWriter
    The JsonWriter class extends the WriteHandler class and provides functionality for writing a collection of Route objects to a JSON file.
    Location
    The Location class represents a location with coordinates and a name.
    Main
     
    Reader
    The Reader class is responsible for reading data from a file whose path is provided through an environment variable.
    ReadHandler
    Abstraction over file reading so that you can set different ways of reading in the future Not only Json Such as Yaml, XML, etc.
    RecursionDetectedException
     
    ResponseStatus
     
    Route
    The Route class represents a route with information such as ID, name, coordinates, creation date, locations (from and to), and distance.
    ScannerManager
    The ScannerManager class manages the Scanner instances used for reading input from various sources.
    ScriptExecutes
    Handles the execution of script files, ensuring proper command execution while preventing recursion loops.
    ServerAdd
     
    ServerAddIfMax
     
    ServerAddIfMin
     
    ServerClear
     
    ServerCommand
     
    ServerCountByDistance
     
    ServerCountGreaterThanDistance
     
    ServerExit
     
    ServerHelp
     
    ServerInfo
     
    ServerPrintFieldDescendingDistance
     
    ServerRemoveById
     
    ServerRemoveGreater
     
    ServerResponse
     
    ServerSave
     
    ServerShow
     
    ServerUpdate
     
    WriteHandler
    Abstraction over file reading so that you can set different ways of writing in the future Not only Json Such as Yaml, XML, etc.
    Writer
    The Writer class is responsible for writing data to a file whose path is specified through an environment variable.
